name: Tiny Tasks in Teeny Town
description:
CONTEXT 

This game is a project that I'm making for my college course so it would really help me out if you could fill this form after playing the game. Thanks! :)

https://forms.gle/DeB6ZVr4hfWYCfMK8

CONTROLS

WASD to move, pick up items and start conversations. (Walk into an item or NPC to interact with it)

SPACEBAR to continue a conversation. 

(If the controls don't work click inside the game screen and try again)

GAMEPLAY

Meet the habitants of Teeny Town and help them with their day-to-day problems. An irresponsible egg, an untalented pear, a pig who waits for the love of his life, and more. 

There is no win condition so you can stop playing whenever you feel like it, ideally, after helping at least a few people (It would be rude to leave without helping anyone, no?) So have fun and enjoy your time doing Tiny Tasks in Teeny Town!
